comment.author: 83197034@N00
comment._content: There's a photo of a suffrage parade in Washington DC, between 1910 and 1915, elsewhere on the LoC stream. www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2616372206/

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Even more related is www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2658868292/ entitled "Suffrage hike to Washington." undeadsinatra found an article about the event (a walk from New York to Washington DC). The other photo, of a larger group, appears to include at least two of these hikers.

comment.author: 29877325@N07
comment._content: Lovely photo !!! Women throughout history have toilled and struggled hard to achieve their rightfull place in society...the suffrage was only part of this struggle.

comment.author: 14936048@N07
comment._content: Hikers?  These women appear to be on the roof of a building.

comment.author: 44124466908@N01
comment._content: They were activists. Here's another photo www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3102053889/
